Intergovernmental Authority on Development (IGAD) bụ otu azụmahịa mba asatọ na Africa
Ọ gụnyere gọọmentị sitere na Horn of Africa, Ndagwurugwu Nile na nnukwu ọdọ mmiri Africa
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị na DjiboutI.
E hiwere Intergovernmental Authority on Development na 1996

Ọ gara n'ihu na mbụ Intergovernmental Authority on Drrought and Development (IGADD), otu mba dị iche iche tọrọ ntọala na 1986 site na Djibouti, Ethiopia, Somalia, Sudan, Uganda na Kenya, na-elekwasị anya na mmepe na gburugburu ebe obibi
E mechara kwaga isi ụlọ ọrụ IGADD na Djibouti, na-eso nkwekọrịta nke mba ndị otu ahụ bịanyere aka na ya na Jenụwarị 1986
Eritria sonyeere nzukọ a na 1993, ka ha nwetere nnwere onwe.
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 1995, Nzukọ nke ndị isi steeti na gọọmentị zutere na Addis Ababa, ebe ha kwetara iwusi mmekọrịta ike site na nzukọ ahụ
Nke a sochiri site na ịbịanye aka n'akwụkwọ ozi iji gbanwee Charter / Agreement nke IGADD na 21 Machị 1996
E mechara malite Revitalised IGAD, usoro nhazi ọhụrụ, na 25 Nọvemba 1996 na Djibouti.
N'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2006, Kansụl Udo na Nchebe nke AU kwadoro atụmatụ IGAD iji tinye ọrụ nkwado udo nke IGAD na Somalia (IGASOM).
Na 21 February 2007, United Nations Security Council kwadoro Mkpebi 1744, nke nyere ikike ibuga otu ọhụrụ African Union Mission na Somalia (AMISOM) n'ọnọdụ IGASOM.
Onye nnọchi anya Mahboub Maalim nyere Workneh Gebeyehu dị ka onye isi odeakwụkwọ na ngwụcha afọ 2019. Maalim, onye Kenya a họpụtara, jere ozi site na 2008 ruo 2019.
